item.title: Why i hate governement
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:25, topic:428658”][quote author=lemme_winks_ link=topic=531353.msg3882616#msg3882616 date=1326160193]

downloading illegally /pirating is a dick move, and i honestly hope the abuse gets dealt with. people don’t commit hours and hours of hard work just to have it be stolen. shame on you, faggot. ps: get a job.

Exactly… it’s like trying to rob a bank, but it’s closed because your government doesn’t allow robbers…stupid metaphor but ye u get it

that’s a retarded analogy
[/quote]
fuck literature[/quote]
regardless of whatever you are talking about now, and if you were not “trolling”, ++respect

Read full topic
